about_the_game:
Insurgence - Second Assault Remaster is the remastered follow-up sequel to the acclaimed Chains of Renegade, and takes players on an unforgettable journey through the civil war that ravaged the kingdom of Aereon. With a brand-new graphics rendering engine and support for four languages, this remaster truly brings the game to life in a whole new way.



In Second Assault, players experience the war from two different sides. On one side, players follow the story of Alissya as she searches for her sister with the help of Rea. On the other side, players step into the shoes of Tressa Lauretilion, a knight of noble descent, and her friend Sara as they lead the fight against the Imralia Rebellion and try to prove Tressa's worth as a Lauretilion.

The stories from both sides are intricately woven together, creating a unique narrative experience that is sure to captivate players. As players progress through the game, they'll encounter a vast cast of characters, each with their own motivations and beliefs, and make choices that will have a lasting impact on the outcome of the war.



In addition to its gripping story, Second Assault also features deep customization options and engaging battles. Players can choose from a wide variety of skills, weapons, armor, and accessories to build their perfect party, and engage in classic turn-based battles that require careful strategy and planning to emerge victorious.

Insurgence - Second Assault is a must-play for fans of turn-based RPGs and immersive storytelling, offering a rich and engaging gaming experience that is sure to keep players hooked from start to finish. With its stunning graphics, deep customization options, and compelling story, this remastered version of the game is an experience that no player should miss.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 / Windows 8.1
  • Processor: AMD A4 4000 APU or Intel Celeron B840
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5450 / Intel HD 2500 / Nvidia GT 420
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 Bit 44.1 Khz
  • Additional Notes: On High Refresh Rate Monitor, Please set it to 60hz or 59hz
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD A4 9125 APU or Intel Celeron N4100
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6450 / Intel HD 3000 / Nvidia GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 24 Bit 192 Khz
  • Additional Notes: On High Refresh Rate Monitor, Please set it to 60hz or 59hz
